vsParam:
Uh?
What are you all doing here?

Ah, Anise! Perfect timing.
We were just about to look for you. Look at this.

A commission... A commission to kill monsters?
It seems that these monsters have caused lots of damage...

That's right... And they are smart too. That's why
the hunt for them has been unsuccessful so far.

They steal luggage, and sneakily
surround and attack caravans...

I see...
So they commissioned us to kill the monsters, right?

Yes!
After all, we have Anise the Sage!

Ughhh... I'm just an apprentice sage...
To be honest, I don't have much confidence in myself...

But since the monsters have been wreaking havoc,
we can't let them off the hook. I'll do my best!
This should be a walk to the park for Anis!

Yes! So, without further ado,
let's go hunt some monsters!
